overview:
Located in Silicon valley, Chintu Parikh is an experienced general manager with successful track record of founding, managing and growing Internet & software businesses from ground-up. Most recently, at Yahoo!, as a senior manager and business lead, he led successful launches of a niche ad-network and a mobile advertising platform in US, UK and Japan; Acquired and managed mid to long-tail web publishers and Developed market requirements & product roadmap for the platform. He spearheaded the ad-network revenue growth from zero to $6M (annual run rate) within one year of launch and amid difficult business circumstances.

Prior to Yahoo! Chintu was a co-founder and CEO of a Wi-Fi startup where he raised two rounds of venture financing, build a strong team and led the dramatic transformation of a patented Carnegie Mellon University research technology into a market leading commercial product with marquee customers â€“ WebMD, United States Senate, National Institute of Health & more; partnerships with Cisco Systems & Black Box and strong media recognition. The company was sold to a leading IT consulting and product company.
